name: Drexthar Bloodtwin

skills.name: Eldritch Flames
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 30% chance of placing an [HP Burn] for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 20% of the damage inflicted if the target is afflicted by a [HP Burn] debuff.

effects.notes: 3-hit multi-hit. 1.0x DEF per hit. DEF-scaling champion.
30% chance per hit to place HP Burn for 2 turns. 3 hits = ~66% total chance for at least one proc.
Heals 20% of damage inflicted IF target has HP Burn. Excellent sustain in HP Burn teams.

skills.book_value: Medium: +20% damage total. A2/Passive higher priority.
skills.notes: 3-hit multi-hit synergizes with Giant Slayer (~66% proc). HP Burn on-hit + heal when HP Burn active = good sustain. DEF scaling.

skills.name: Burning Lash
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. This chance increases to 100% if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff. Also places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns if the [Provoke] debuff is placed.

effects.notes: 40% base (60% booked) chance to Provoke. Increases to 100% if target has HP Burn. Synergizes with A1/Passive HP Burn.
Places 50% Dec ATK IF Provoke lands. Conditional debuff.

skills.book_value: HIGH: +15% damage, +20% Provoke chance (40%→60%), -1 turn cooldown (4→3). Essential for more frequent HP Burn/Provoke cycling.
skills.notes: AoE Provoke + Dec ATK combo. 100% Provoke chance if HP Burn active = reliable CC. Books improve Provoke reliability and reduce cooldown.

skills.name: Fiery Blood (Passive)
skills.description: Has a 55% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns on the attacker when hit. This Champion's RES increases by 10 for every enemy under a [HP Burn] debuff. Stacks up to 50.

effects.notes: 55% base (75% booked) chance to place HP Burn on attacker when hit. Counters multi-hit champions well.
+10 RES per enemy with HP Burn (max +50 with 5 enemies burning). Base 50 RES + 50 from passive = 100 RES in full HP Burn teams.

skills.book_value: HIGH: +15% passive HP Burn chance (55%→70%→75%). Significantly improves HP Burn spread.
skills.notes: AMAZING passive for HP Burn teams. Places HP Burn on attackers (counters multi-hit). RES scales with HP Burn count (max +50). Books improve proc chance.

forms.aura: Increases Ally DEF in all Battles by 33%
forms.comments: Elite HP Burn specialist. FREE Legendary from Advanced Quests. DEF-scaling tank with HP Burn, Provoke, Dec ATK. Passive spreads HP Burn when hit. Must book passive and A2. Excellent for Clan Boss, Doom Tower, Dungeons.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: HP Burn passive on being hit + A1 heal when HP Burn active = excellent sustain. Can solo or tank many dungeon waves. Provoke chains with HP Burn for control. Immortal set + high DEF = near-unkillable in some content.

mechanics_advisory: FREE Legendary from Advanced Quests (everyone should get him). Elite HP Burn specialist for all content. DEF-scaling tank with HP Burn (A1/Passive), Provoke (A2), Dec ATK (A2). Passive is AMAZING: places HP Burn on attackers (55% base, 75% booked) AND gains +10 RES per enemy with HP Burn (max +50 = 200 RES total with 5 burning enemies). Synergy: A1 places HP Burn → A2 100% Provoke if HP Burn active + Dec ATK → Passive spreads more HP Burn when hit → Self-sustain from A1 heal. MUST BOOK Passive (+20% HP Burn chance) and A2 (-1 cooldown, +20% Provoke). 33% DEF aura for all battles. User Priority: Clan Boss UNM (Priority 1 - 9/10), Dungeons (Priority 2 - 8/10), Doom Tower (Priority 3 - 9/10). Demonspawn Faction Wars excellent (9/10). Build 3000+ DEF, 250+ ACC, 180+ SPD, 150+ RES.
